Destinations.name: Giza Pyramids
Destinations.description: One of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World and a world-famous archaeological site.

Destinations.name: Karnak Temple
Destinations.description: The largest religious complex in ancient Egypt with massive columns and statues.

Destinations.name: Sharm El Sheikh
Destinations.description: A famous tourist city known for resorts, beaches, and diving spots.

Destinations.name: Nile River Cruise
Destinations.description: Experience the beauty of Egypt while cruising along the Nile River.

Destinations.name: Abu Simbel Temples
Destinations.description: Famous rock temples built by Ramses II, relocated to avoid flooding from the Aswan High Dam.

Destinations.name: Siwa Oasis
Destinations.description: A remote oasis known for its unique culture, natural springs, and ancient ruins.

Destinations.name: Alexandria city
Destinations.description: Home to the historic Library of Alexandria and beautiful Mediterranean beaches.

Destinations.name: Dahab
Destinations.description: A laid-back beach town known for its diving spots and relaxed atmosphere.

Destinations.name: Luxor Temple
Destinations.description: An ancient temple complex located on the east bank of the Nile River.

tours.title: Full-Day Tour to the Pyramids and Sphinx
Sharm El Sheikh trip and Diving Experience
Abu Simbel Day Trip from Aswan

blogs.title: Best Time to Visit Egypt
blogs.content: The best time to visit is from October to April when the weather is mild and pleasant.
blogs.author: Ramy Ahmed

blogs.title: 10 Travel Tips for Visiting Egypt
blogs.content: Visit historical sites, book tours with trusted companies, and plan ahead for peak season.
blogs.author: Sara El-Masry

blogs.title: Exploring the Egyptian Cuisine
blogs.content: Try traditional dishes like koshari, ful medames, and molokhia for an authentic taste of Egypt.
blogs.author: Omar Hassan

blogs.title: Top 5 Beaches in Egypt
blogs.content: Discover the best beaches in Sharm El Sheikh, Dahab, and Marsa Matruh for sun and sea lovers.
blogs.author: Laila Nasser

blogs.title: Cultural Etiquette in Egypt
blogs.content: Respect local customs, dress modestly, and always ask permission before taking photos of people.
blogs.author: Youssef Karim

blogs.title: Must-See Historical Sites in Egypt
blogs.content: From the Pyramids of Giza to the temples of Luxor, explore Egypt's rich history and heritage.
blogs.author: Nadia Fathy
